title: Deadpool & Wolverine Preorder: Walmart Restocks Steelbook, Amazon Discounts Standard 4K Blu-Ray
description: Deadpool & Wolverine 4K Blu-ray Limited Editions Only the Deadpool Steelbook Edition is in stock ahead of next week's launch. Preorder at Walmart Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Walmart (All Editions) Deadpool & Wolverine 4K Blu-ray The standard 4K Blu-ray edition is significantly cheaper. Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Walmart Deadpool and Wolverine releases on 4K Blu-ray next Tuesday, October 22. The biggest live-action film of 2024 has multiple limited editions, including an extremely popular pair of Deadpool and Wolverine 4K Steelbook Editions. The Deadpool Limited-Edition Steelbook has been restocked at Walmart and is available to preorder for $55. Amazon is sold out of the Deadpool Steelbook, so you'll want to secure your preorder at Walmart soon. Unfortunately, the Wolverine Steelbook is sold out at Amazon and Walmart.If you don't care about steelbook cases, the standard 4K Blu-ray edition of Deadpool & Wolverine is available to preorder for a markedly lower price at Amazon and Walmart. Deadpool & Wolverine's regular 4K Blu-ray is the No. 1 best-selling movie on Amazon. Walmart also has an exclusive standard Blu-ray edition with pop-up art that's discounted to $30 ahead of its release.Quick Look: Deadpool & Wolverine PreordersAmazonContinue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Deadpool & Wolverine is now available to buy or rent from Prime Video, with multiple limited-edition Blu-rays slated for October 22.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Deadpool and Wolverine releases on 4K Blu-ray next Tuesday, October 22. The biggest live-action film of 2024 has multiple limited editions, including an extremely popular pair of Deadpool and Wolverine 4K Steelbook Editions. The Deadpool Limited-Edition Steelbook has been restocked at Walmart and is available to preorder for $55. Amazon is sold out of the Deadpool Steelbook, so you'll want to secure your preorder at Walmart soon. Unfortunately, the Wolverine Steelbook is sold out at Amazon and Walmart.

If you don't care about steelbook cases, the standard 4K Blu-ray edition of Deadpool & Wolverine is available to preorder for a markedly lower price at Amazon and Walmart. Deadpool & Wolverine's regular 4K Blu-ray is the No. 1 best-selling movie on Amazon. Walmart also has an exclusive standard Blu-ray edition with pop-up art that's discounted to $30 ahead of its release.

Quick Look: Deadpool & Wolverine Preorders

Amazon

  • Deadpool & Wolverine (4K Blu-ray) -- $37 ($50) -- In stock
  • Deadpool Limited-Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) -- $66 - Sold out
  • Wolverine Limited-Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) -- $66 - Sold out
  • Deadpool & Wolverine (4K Blu-ray) -- $37 ($50) -- In stock
  • Deadpool & Wolverine (Blu-ray) -- $25 ($41) -- In stock

Walmart

  • Deadpool Limited-Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) -- $55 - In stock
  • Wolverine Limited-Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) -- $55 - Sold out
  • Walmart-Exclusive O-Sleeve Pop-up Art Edition (Blu-ray) -- $30 ($34.70) - In stock
  • Deadpool & Wolverine (4K Blu-ray) -- $30 ($50) - In stock
  • Deadpool & Wolverine (Blu-ray) -- $25 ($41) - In stock

All 4K Blu-ray editions of Deadpool and Wolverine also include a Blu-ray disc and a voucher for the digital edition. Standard Blu-ray editions come with a voucher for the digital version. You can also buy Deadpool and Wolverine on Prime Video for $30 or rent it for $25.

Deadpool & Wolverine 4K Blu-ray Steelbook - Deadpool Variant

$55 at Walmart | $66 (sold out) at Amazon -- If price drops after you preorder, you will only pay the lowest offered price before your order ships.

There are two limited-edition 4K UHD versions of the film for you to consider. Both come packed with the same bonus content, but they feature exclusive steelbooks. This version is the Deadpool variant, which features an action shot of Deadpool on its cover and a blood-red interior. Some of the bonus content includes commentary from director Shawn Levy and Ryan Reynolds, multiple deleted scenes, and several featurettes that that go behind the scenes of the hit film.

Deadpool & Wolverine 4K Blu-ray Steelbook - Wolverine Variant

$55 (sold out) at Walmart | $66 (sold out) at Amazon -- Also covered by preorder price guarantee

This variant gets you all the same content as the Deadpool variant, but instead features Wolverine on its cover and a vibrant yellow interior. That means you’re free to pick whichever 4K steelbook you think would look best in your collection--or simply grab whichever one is still in stock. At the moment, that means the Deadpool variant above.

Deadpool & Wolverine: Walmart-Exclusive Blu-ray Edition

$30 ($34.70)

Though it only gets you standard 1080p Blu-ray and digital versions of the film, this Walmart-exclusive version of Deadpool & Wolverine comes with a pretty cool slipcase. Called an "O-Sleeve," the packaging unfolds to reveal chaotic art featuring a lot of Deadpools surrounding Hugh Jackman's exasperated Wolverine.

Walmart has dropped the price of preorders from $34.70 to $30.

Deadpool & Wolverine Bonus Features

Here’s a closer look at the bonus features you’ll find when picking up Deadpool & Wolverine for your home.

  • Finding Madonna - Making the Oner: A breakdown from director Shawn Levy discussing the iconic fight that brings Deadpool and Wolverine together.
  • Practical Approach: The cast and crew discuss the life and achievements of the late Ray Chan.
  • Loose Ends: The cast discusses many of the cameos that appear throughout the film and other behind-the-scenes content.
  • Wolverine: Jackman talks about playing Wolverine yet again and how it compares to his past performances.
  • Fun Sack - Dr. Deadpool: Learn how to get a checkup with Deadpool.
  • Product Review: Take a look at behind-the-scenes items and props.
  • Wade Is Back: A unique promotional video from Reynolds and Jackman.
  • Deleted Scenes
  • Gag Reel
  • Commentary from Levy and Reynolds

Deadpool & Wolverine Books

For more Deadpool & Wolverine fun, you can check out a handful of other cool products. One of the best items is Marvel Studios’ Deadpool & Wolverine: The Art of the Movie (Hardcover), which arrives on October 29. It takes a closer look at the film and features never-before-seen images and artwork from the blockbuster. It's currently on sale for $90 (was $100). You can also preorder Deadpool & Wolverine: Exposed - Photos From the Set, which is the first Marvel movie to get a book chronicling the production of the film in photographs. It doesn't release until March 25, 2025, but it's cheaper than the art book at $60.

Two Deadpool & Wolverine comic book collections released this year, too. Deadpool vs. Wolverine, a collection of crossover comics featuring the duo, was published in March and is available for $25 (was $40). Meanwhile, Deadpool & Wolverine: WWIII, a graphic novel collecting the recent four-issue limited series, was published on October 1 and is available for $16.
